trans-unit.source: Sets the number of rows of buttons

seg-source.mrk: Sets the number of rows of buttons

target.mrk: Sets the number of rows of buttons

trans-unit.source: Number of rows requested. The minimum number of rows is one, and the maximum number of rows is equal to the total number of buttons.

seg-source.mrk: The minimum number of rows is one, and the maximum number of rows is equal to the total number of buttons.

target.mrk: The minimum number of rows is one, and the maximum number of rows is equal to the total number of buttons.

trans-unit.source: [optional] Flag that indicates whether to create more rows than requested when the system can not create the number of rows specified by $iRows.

seg-source.mrk: Flag that indicates whether to create more rows than requested when the system can not create the number of rows specified by $iRows.

target.mrk: Flag that indicates whether to create more rows than requested when the system can not create the number of rows specified by $iRows.

trans-unit.source: If this parameter is True, the system creates more rows.

seg-source.mrk: If this parameter is True, the system creates more rows.

target.mrk: If this parameter is True, the system creates more rows.

trans-unit.source: If it is False, the system creates fewer rows.

seg-source.mrk: If it is False, the system creates fewer rows.

target.mrk: If it is False, the system creates fewer rows.

trans-unit.source: Returns an array with the following format:

seg-source.mrk: Returns an array with the following format:

target.mrk: Returns an array with the following format:

trans-unit.source: [0] - X coordinate of the upper left corner of the rectangle

seg-source.mrk: [0] - X coordinate of the upper left corner of the rectangle

target.mrk: [0] - X coordinate of the upper left corner of the rectangle

trans-unit.source: [1] - Y coordinate of the upper left corner of the rectangle

seg-source.mrk: [1] - Y coordinate of the upper left corner of the rectangle

target.mrk: [1] - Y coordinate of the upper left corner of the rectangle

trans-unit.source: [2] - X coordinate of the lower right corner of the rectangle

seg-source.mrk: [2] - X coordinate of the lower right corner of the rectangle

target.mrk: [2] - X coordinate of the lower right corner of the rectangle

trans-unit.source: [3] - Y coordinate of the lower right corner of the rectangle

seg-source.mrk: [3] - Y coordinate of the lower right corner of the rectangle

target.mrk: [3] - Y coordinate of the lower right corner of the rectangle

trans-unit.source: Because the system does not break up button groups when setting the number of rows, the resulting number of rows might differ from the number requested.

seg-source.mrk: Because the system does not break up button groups when setting the number of rows, the resulting number of rows might differ from the number requested.

target.mrk: Because the system does not break up button groups when setting the number of rows, the resulting number of rows might differ from the number requested.
